snippet: The demonstration in Kunduz had been called by residents of Kanam village, who last week lost 11 men killed by militiamen who had been angered by the village’s alleged support for Taliban insurgents.
abstract: Suicide bomber attacks the police at the site of a planned demonstration in the northern provincial capital of Kunduz, Afghanistan, killing 16 people; ten of the dead are police officers and six are civilians.

byline.original: By ABDUL MATIN SARFRAZ and ROD NORDLAND

lead_paragraph: The demonstration in Kunduz had been called by residents of Kanam village, who last week lost 11 men killed by militiamen who had been angered by the village’s alleged support for Taliban insurgents.

headline.seo: Bomber Kills 16 in Attack on Protest Site in Kunduz
headline.main: Bomber Kills 16 in Attack on Afghan Protest Site
